key.name: action-sleep-type-battery
key.summary: Whether to hibernate, suspend or do nothing when inactive
key.description: The type of sleeping that should be performed when the computer is inactive. Possible values are "hibernate", "suspend" and "nothing".

key.name: action-critical-battery
key.summary: Battery critical low action
key.description: The action to take when the battery is critically low. Possible values are "hibernate", "suspend", "shutdown" and "nothing".

key.name: event-when-closed-battery
key.summary: If the battery event should occur when the lid is shut and the power disconnected
key.description: If the battery lid close event should occur (for example 'Suspend when lid closed on battery') when the lid is previously shut and the AC power disconnected at a later time.

key.name: action-sleep-type-ac
key.summary: Whether to hibernate, suspend or do nothing when inactive
key.description: The type of sleeping that should be performed when the computer is inactive. Possible values are "hibernate", "suspend" and "nothing".

key.name: action-critical-ups
key.summary: UPS critical low action
key.description: The action to take when the UPS is critically low. Possible values are "hibernate", "suspend", "shutdown" and "nothing".

key.name: action-low-ups
key.summary: UPS low power action
key.description: The action to take when the UPS is low. Possible values are "hibernate", "suspend", "shutdown" and "nothing".

key.name: backlight-enable
key.summary: Allow backlight brightness adjustment
key.description: If the screen brightness should be changed when switching between AC and battery power.

key.name: backlight-battery-reduce
key.summary: Reduce the backlight brightness when on battery power
key.description: If the screen should be reduced in brightness when the computer is on battery power.

key.name: idle-brightness
key.summary: The brightness of the screen when idle
key.description: This is the laptop panel screen brightness used when the session is idle. Only valid when use-time-for-policy is true.

key.name: idle-dim-battery
key.summary: Dim the screen after a period of inactivity when on battery power
key.description: If the screen should be dimmed to save power when the computer is idle when on battery power.

key.name: idle-dim-time
key.summary: The default amount of time to dim the screen after idle
key.description: The default amount of time to dim the screen after idle.

key.name: brightness-dim-battery
key.summary: LCD dimming amount when on battery
key.description: The amount to dim the brightness of the display when on battery power. Possible values are between 0 and 100.

key.name: idle-dim-ac
key.summary: Dim the screen after a period of inactivity when on AC power
key.description: If the screen should be dimmed to save power when the computer is idle when on AC power.

key.name: dpms-method-ac
key.summary: Method used to blank screen on AC
key.description: The DPMS method used to blank the screen when on AC power. Possible values are "standby", "suspend" and "off".

key.name: dpms-method-battery
key.summary: Method used to blank screen on battery
key.description: The DPMS method used to blank the screen when on battery power. Possible values are "standby", "suspend" and "off".

key.name: brightness-ac
key.summary: LCD brightness when on AC
key.description: The brightness of the display when on AC power. Possible values are between 0.0 and 100.0.

key.name: button-suspend
key.summary: Suspend button action
key.description: The action to take when the system suspend button is pressed. Possible values are "suspend", "hibernate", "interactive", "shutdown" and "nothing".

key.name: button-hibernate
key.summary: Hibernate button action
key.description: The action to take when the system hibernate button is pressed. Possible values are "suspend", "hibernate", "interactive", "shutdown" and "nothing".

key.name: button-power
key.summary: Power button action
key.description: The action to take when the system power button is pressed. Possible values are "suspend", "hibernate", "interactive", "shutdown" and "nothing".

key.name: button-lid-battery
key.summary: Laptop lid close action on battery
key.description: The action to take when the laptop lid is closed and the laptop is on battery power. Possible values are "suspend", "hibernate", "blank", and "nothing".

key.name: button-lid-ac
key.summary: Laptop lid close action when on AC
key.description: The action to take when the laptop lid is closed and the laptop is on AC power. Possible values are "suspend", "hibernate", "blank" and "nothing".

key.name: schema-version
key.summary: The default configuration version.
key.description: The version of the installed version of the schema. Do not edit this value, it is used so that configure changes between versions can be detected.

key.name: use-profile-time
key.summary: If the learnt profile should be used to calculate the time remaining
key.description: If the learnt profile should be used to calculate the time remaining. Only turn this off for debugging.

key.name: use-time-for-policy
key.summary: Whether to use time-based notifications
key.description: If time based notifications should be used. If set to false, then the percentage change is used instead, which may fix a broken ACPI BIOS.

key.name: check-type-cpu
key.summary: Check CPU load before sleeping
key.description: If the CPU load should be checked before doing the idle action.

key.name: network-sleep
key.summary: Whether NetworkManager should be connected and disconnected on sleep.
key.description: Whether NetworkManager should disconnect before suspending or hibernating and connect on resume.

key.name: lock-use-screensaver
key.summary: Use mate-screensaver lock setting
key.description: Whether to use the screen lock setting of mate-screensaver to decide if the screen is locked after a hibernate, suspend or blank screen.

key.name: lock-blank-screen
key.summary: Lock screen when blanked
key.description: Whether the screen is locked when the screen is turned off. Only used if lock-use-screensaver is false.

key.name: lock-suspend
key.summary: Lock screen on suspend
key.description: Whether the screen is locked when the computer wakes up from a suspend. Only used if lock-use-screensaver is false.

key.name: lock-hibernate
key.summary: Lock screen on hibernate
key.description: Whether the screen is locked when the computer wakes up from a hibernate. Only used if lock-use-screensaver is false.

key.name: lock-keyring-suspend
key.summary: Lock MATE keyring on sleep
key.description: Whether the MATE keyring is locked before the computer enters suspend. This means the keyring will have to be unlocked on resume.

key.name: lock-keyring-hibernate
key.summary: Lock MATE keyring on sleep
key.description: Whether the MATE keyring is locked before the computer enters hibernate. This means the keyring will have to be unlocked on resume.

key.name: spindown-enable-ac
key.summary: If the low-power mode should be enabled when on AC
key.description: If the system low-power mode should be enabled when on AC power.

key.name: spindown-enable-battery
key.summary: If the low-power mode should be enabled when on battery
key.description: If the system low-power mode should be enabled when on laptop battery power.

key.name: spindown-timeout-ac
key.summary: Seconds of inactivity to spin down when on AC
key.description: The number of seconds of inactivity to spin down the disks when on AC power.

key.name: spindown-timeout-battery
key.summary: Seconds of inactivity to spin down when on battery
key.description: The number of seconds of inactivity to spin down the disks when on battery power.

key.name: notify-perhaps-recall
key.summary: If we should show the recalled battery warning for a broken battery
key.description: If we should show the recalled battery warning for a broken battery. Set this to false only if you know your battery is okay.

key.name: notify-low-capacity
key.summary: If we should show the low capacity warning for a broken battery
key.description: If we should show the low capacity warning for a broken battery.

key.name: notify-discharging
key.summary: Notify when AC adapter is disconnected
key.description: If the user should be notified when the AC adapter is disconnected.

key.name: notify-fully-charged
key.summary: Notify when fully charged
key.description: If a notification message should be displayed when the battery is fully charged.

key.name: notify-sleep-failed
key.summary: Notify on a sleep failure
key.description: If a notification message should be displayed after suspend or hibernate failed.

key.name: notify-sleep-failed-uri
key.summary: The URI to show to the user on sleep failure
key.description: When sleep fails we can show the user a button to help fix the situation. Leave this blank if the button should not be shown.

key.name: notify-low-power
key.summary: Notify on a low power
key.description: If a notification message should be displayed when the battery is getting low.

key.name: info-history-graph-points
key.summary: Whether we should show the history data points
key.description: Whether we should show the history data points in the statistics window.

key.name: info-history-graph-smooth
key.summary: Whether we should smooth the history data
key.description: Whether we should smooth the history data in the graph.

key.name: info-history-type
key.summary: The default graph type to show for history
key.description: The default graph type to show in the history window.

key.name: info-history-time
key.summary: The maximum time displayed for history
key.description: The maximum duration of time displayed on the x-axis of the history graph.

key.name: info-stats-graph-points
key.summary: Whether we should show the stats data points
key.description: Whether we should show the stats data points in the statistics window.

key.name: info-stats-graph-smooth
key.summary: Whether we should smooth the stats data
key.description: Whether we should smooth the stats data in the graph.

key.name: info-stats-type
key.summary: The default graph type to show for stats
key.description: The default graph type to show in the stats window.

key.name: info-page-number
key.summary: The index of the page number to show by default
key.description: The index of the page number to show by default which is used to return focus to the correct page.

key.name: info-last-device
key.summary: The ID of the last device selected
key.description: The identifier of the last device which is used to return focus to the correct device.

key.name: percentage-low
key.summary: Percentage considered low
key.description: The percentage of the battery when it is considered low. Only valid when use-time-for-policy is false.

key.name: percentage-critical
key.summary: Percentage considered critical
key.description: The percentage of the battery when it is considered critical. Only valid when use-time-for-policy is false.

key.name: percentage-action
key.summary: Percentage action is taken
key.description: The percentage of the battery when the critical action is performed. Only valid when use-time-for-policy is false.

key.name: time-low
key.summary: The time remaining when low
key.description: The time remaining in seconds of the battery when it is considered low. Only valid when use-time-for-policy is true.

key.name: time-critical
key.summary: The time remaining when critical
key.description: The time remaining in seconds of the battery when it is considered critical. Only valid when use-time-for-policy is true.

key.name: time-action
key.summary: The time remaining when action is taken
key.description: The time remaining in seconds of the battery when critical action is taken. Only valid when use-time-for-policy is true.

key.name: sleep-computer-battery
key.summary: Sleep timeout computer when on battery
key.description: The amount of time in seconds the computer on battery power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep.

key.name: sleep-computer-ac
key.summary: Sleep timeout computer when on AC
key.description: The amount of time in seconds the computer on AC power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep.

key.name: sleep-computer-ups
key.summary: Sleep timeout computer when on UPS
key.description: The amount of time in seconds the computer on UPS power needs to be inactive before it goes to sleep.

key.name: sleep-display-ac
key.summary: Sleep timeout display when on AC
key.description: The amount of time in seconds before the display goes to sleep when the computer is on AC power.

key.name: sleep-display-battery
key.summary: Sleep timeout display when on battery
key.description: The amount of time in seconds the computer on battery power needs to be inactive before the display goes to sleep.

key.name: sleep-display-ups
key.summary: Sleep timeout display when on UPS
key.description: The amount of time in seconds the computer on UPS power needs to be inactive before the display goes to sleep.

key.name: enable-sound
key.summary: If sounds should be used
key.description: If sounds should be used when the power is critically low, or inhibit requests have stopped the policy action.

key.name: show-actions
key.summary: If preferences and statistics items should be shown in the context menu

key.name: icon-policy
key.summary: When to show the notification icon
key.description: Display options for the notification icon. Valid options are "never", "low", "critical", "charge", and "present".
